com.twitter.sdk.android.core.identity

Class AuthHandler

  • Object
    • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.identity.AuthHandler

  • public abstract class AuthHandler
extends Object
    Abstract class for handling authorization requests.

      Called to request authorization.

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        public abstract boolean authorize(Activity activity)
        Called to request authorization.
        Returns:
        true if authorize request was successfully started.

      • handleOnActivityResult

        public boolean handleOnActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             Intent data)
        Called when Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) is called to complete the authorization flow.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the request code used for SSO
        resultCode - the result code returned by the SSO activity
        data - the result data returned by the SSO activity
